permission.subject: Permission for adding your mod to dokidokimodclub.com
permission.message:
Hi u/{0}!

I'm a bot from https://www.dokidokimodclub.com, which is affiliated with r/DDLCMods.

I am seeking your permission to add your mod, **{1}**, to the above website. If you would like to have full control over how the mod is configured on the website, you can sign up and submit the mod yourself or let a moderator submit it and request ownership.

Thanks!

copyright.subject: Copyright problems with your dokidokimodclub.com submission
copyright.message:
Hi u/{0}!

I'm a bot from https://www.dokidokimodclub.com. 

When our moderators checked your mod submission, **{1}**, they found one or several issues, listed here:

{2}

If you have any questions or you fixed all of those issues, you can contact the approver though Discord: {3}. 

Thanks for using our website!
